format_version.description: Specifies the version of the game this entity was made in. Minimum supported version is 1.17.0. Current supported version is 1.17.0.
format_version.title: Format Version

description.title: Description
description.description: The description contains a single `identifier` string.

identifier.title: Identifier
identifier.description: The unique identifier for this volume. It must be of the form `namespace:name', where namespace cannot be `minecraft`.

minecraft:bounds.title: Bounds
minecraft:bounds.description: Component that defines a minimum and maximum block position for a bounding box and which world dimension the bounding box is in. Every volume must have a bounds component.

dimension.description: The name of the dimension the bounding box will exist in: one of `overworld', `nether` or `the end`.
dimension.title: Dimension

max.description: The maximum block position of the bounding box.
max.title: Maximum

min.description: The minimum block position of the bounding box.
min.title: Minimum

minecraft:fog.title: Fog
minecraft:fog.description: Displays the given fog whenever a player enters the volume. Each volume can only have one fog attached.

fog_identifier.description: The identifier of a fog definition. Note that you will not receive any feedback if the definition does not exist.
fog_identifier.title: Fog Identifier

priority.description: The priority for this fog definition setting. Smaller numbers have higher priority. Fogs with equal priority will be combined together.
priority.title: Priority

minecraft:on_actor_enter.title: On Actor Enter
minecraft:on_actor_enter.description: Component that defines what happens when an actor enters the volume. Can contain multiple json objects.

on_enter.title: On Enter
on_enter.description: Required array that contains all the triggers.

condition.title: Condition
condition.description: Molang expression to test against the actor. The given event will be triggered if the expression evaluates to true.

event.title: Event
event.description: Name of the event to run.

target.title: Target
target.description: One of `self` or `other`. Self means the event is attached to the volume. Other means the event is attached to the actor.

minecraft:on_actor_leave.title: On Actor Leave
minecraft:on_actor_leave.description: Component that defines what happens when an actor leaves the volume.

on_enter.title: On Enter
on_enter.description: Required array that contains all the triggers.

target.title: Target
target.description: One of `self` or `other`. Self means the event is attached to the volume. Other means the event is attached to the actor.

D.title: Format Version
D.description: A version that tells minecraft what type of data format can be expected when reading this file.
